turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order. I placed it a week ago, and I haven't received any updates.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Could you please provide your order number, or the email address associated with your order so I can look that up for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's order number 12345. Honestly, I'm getting a little frustrated. I needed this by last week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am so sorry for the delay! It looks like the package is currently in transit, and is scheduled to arrive in 2 business days. However, based on the carrier's tracking information, it looks like it has been stuck in the same location for the last 3 days. I will escalate this issue to our shipping department to see if we can figure out what happened and expedite the delivery.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's helpful, thanks. What happens if it doesn't arrive within those 2 business days? Also, can you explain why the tracking information is so vague? It just says "in transit" - that's not very helpful, is it?
